title: Free resume creator
description: Create a Great Resume completely for free!

hero.title: Create a Great Resume completely for free
hero.subtitle: No strings attached
hero.description: Use one of 6 professional templates to create a resume and export it to a PDF file. All completly private and free, because people looking for a job shouldn't have to pay a penny to create a good resume.

customization.title: Make the resume yours
customization.description: Select one of 6 templates that reflects your experience the best. Adjust its appearance by rearranging sections, adding a picture or changing paper size.

noFees.title: No hidden fees
noFees.description: Application is 100% free and doesn't offer any paid features. Just fill the form and export pdf file containing your resume.

private.title: Completly private
private.description: Your data doesn't leave your browser. We also don't server any ads.

languages.title: 3 supported languages
languages.description: Currently we support English, French and Polish.

devices.title: Works great on any device
devices.description: Laptop, tablet, smartphone - just choose any of them and perfect your resume.

reimport.title: Reimport your pdf
reimport.description: During export we save resume's structure in pdf itself. This way you can later import your resume in the future to update it.

examples.title: Example resumes
examples.subtitle: You can import any of the resumes below into the application.

action.title: Ready to dive in? Create your resume for free.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? <contact>Contact us</contact>.

dataProcessing.question: How do you process my data?
dataProcessing.answer: Your data is only used to generate your resume and it does not leave your browser. Our application doesn't use any server to generate your resume. It uses javascript to generate it in your browser, securely and privately.

reimport.question: I've created a resume some time ago, how do I edit it?
reimport.answer: Go to creator and select the 'import' option from the top. Please note that this option only works for pdfs generated throught our application.

multipleVersions.question: How do I maintain multiple versions of the resume?
multipleVersions.answer: Every time you want to preserve a version you can just download it. When you want to make changes you can always import it back.

bugs.question: How do I report a bug?
bugs.answer: Github issues are used to track bugs. Please note that all issues are public, make sure you don't include any data you want to keep private! You can create issue on github here.

monetization.question: How do you make money from this?

monetizationContinuation.question: What do you mean you don't make money out of this?
monetizationContinuation.answer: We just want to make resume creation accessible for everyone. It all started when my mother lost her job during covid and I wanted to find some resume creators. I found a lot of them baiting you with the promise of "free resume creator", but they only allowed exporting to a plain text file (yes, a regular .txt file), forcing you to pay for the pdf. You learn this only after you fill ALL YOUR DATA. There's nothing wrong with wanting to be compensated for work, but misleading people in difficult situations is definitely not okay.

help.question: How do I express my gratitude?
help.answer: If you're satisfied with our tool, you can share it on social media or just tell your friends about it.

tracking.question: Do you track your users?
tracking.answer: We use Google Analytics for tracking usage. It gives us insight into how people use our application. No worries, we don't send any part of you resume to an external service. If you want to withdraw your consent you can do it directly from out <privacyPolicy>Privacy Policy</privacyPolicy>.

trust.question: How can I be sure you are not lying?
trust.answer: You can see the source code yourself <sourceCode>here</sourceCode>.

authors.subtitle: Hey there, we've created this app.
authors.text:
Ola handled the design, Kuba wrote the code (he's to blame if you find any bugs).

The job search can be a stressful and overwhelming experience. We believe our app can help by making at least one step of the process a little bit simpler.
